Columns.Description: OpsManagerfor all records in this table.
Columns.Name: SourceSystem

Columns.Description: Date and time the record was created.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Resource ID of the Azure resource reporting the metric. Same as _ResourceId present for backward compatibility reasons. _ResourceId should be used
Columns.Name: ResourceId

Columns.Description: Reduces the set of data collected. The syntax allowed depends on the operation. See the operation's description for details.
Columns.Name: ResultType

Columns.Description: Resource name of the Azure resource reporting the metric.
Columns.Name: Resource

Columns.Description: Resource group name of the Azure resource reporting the metric.
Columns.Name: ResourceGroup

Columns.Description: Resource provider of the Azure resource reporting the metric.
Columns.Name: ResourceProvider

Columns.Description: Subscription id of the Azure resource reporting the metric.
Columns.Name: SubscriptionId

Columns.Description: Sum of all of the values in the time range.
Columns.Name: Total

Columns.Description: Number of samples collected during the time range. Can be used to determine the number of values that contributed to the average value.
Columns.Name: Count

Columns.Description: Maximum value collected during in the time range.
Columns.Name: Maximum

Columns.Description: Minimum value collected during in the time range.
Columns.Name: Minimum

Columns.Description: Time grain of the metric e.g. PT1M
Columns.Name: TimeGrain

Columns.Description: Unit of the metric. Examples include Seconds Percent Bytes.
Columns.Name: UnitName

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
